notes.note: When a website uses a file upload field (<input type=file>) without specifying what types of files it accepts, Firefox for Android will now offer additional options to make file uploads easier. Users will see choices to pick a file, take a photo, or record audio directly from their device.

text:
Thanks for using Firefox! Have feedback or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you at [Android Support][1]


  [1]: https://mzl.la/AndroidSupport
title: Firefox for Android 146.0 Release
